text:
Ranveer Singh Recreates The Madness Of 'Khali Bali' With Shikhar Dhawan & It’s All Sorts Of Crazy
Ranveer Singh Recreates The Madness Of 'Khali Bali' With Shikhar Dhawan & It’s All Sorts Of Crazy
Ranveer Singh is the epitome of energy. He is the life of every party and every film set as well. He is currently shooting for 83, a biopic on Kapil Dev and a film which is based on India’s 1983 World Cup win.
So far, we have seen him singing Tum Toh Thehre Pardesi on a bus ride with the entire cast and crew.
Also, he showcases his rapping skills by singing Apna Time Ayega.
He danced to Nashe Si Chadh Gayi as well.
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 544 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
So, all in all, Ranveer Singh ensures that not only him but the entire cast and the crew is having a ball on the sets.
He recently met with Shikhar Dhawan, and well, there were fireworks all around. The duo danced on Khali Bali and it’s something you don’t want to miss.
Isn’t he amazing?
title: Ranveer Singh Recreates The Madness Of 'Khali Bali' With Shikhar Dhawan & It’s All Sorts Of Crazy
description: Ranveer Singh recently met with Shikhar Dhawan, and well, there were fireworks all around. The duo danced on Khali Bali and boy it’s totally something you don’t want to miss. Ranveer Singh is the epitome of energy. He is the life of every party and every film set as well, it seems. He is currently shootinf for 83, a biopic on Kapil Dev and a film which is based on India’s 1983 World Cup win.
